So cool to have mouse controls on the Switch 2!

This is amazing
Drop the prices you fucks.

We need a Prime Hunters style Multiplayer in this game!!!
Drop the Price.
This is definitely COD ready

Tell me you don’t know how to play with a mouse without telling me.

Great option though
Wait, this is actually so cool!
Okay I forgive Nintendo just for Metroid prime 4
halo 3 looked better ngl

Drop the price optimize the game
@predobitencourt pena que quem tá jogando é horrível, mas muito massa a função
Would prefer a standard mouse as an accessory honestly.
Like we have a desk in our living rooms Greedtendo
This I cool and all but we can admit it’s mid.. mouse to joycon isn’t innovation it’s a mere perk of the systems design…
wow...looks great guys.....
Drop the price!!
Is there a left handed mode for the joycon 2 mouse?
Do I have to pay to watch this?
Release date bud also drop the price of your other games

notice how the game says demo?

Lower your game prices
wonderful, but I wish I could play MP4 after replaying these 2 wonderful games in remastered version.

Official mouse controls on Metroid Prime 4.  I can still hardly believe it.  Gonna have a blast with this game.
Looks great. Still no price, though, this will likely also be an $80 game.
10/10 would pay $80 for this
Not gonna lie. This kinda sold me on mouse controls. Seamless switching is pretty dope.
gross... I hate that mouse controls are going to be shoehorned into games.  A mouse is a wholly unsuitable tool for playing games.

It's peak

Now please drop that game price
DROP THE PRICE. Or we will WII U you the fuck out of existence.
Fix the prices
When does it release though!? This game was shown first of any of the games in their current lineup and yet it still doesn’t have a release date.
DROP THE PRICE!
I’ll never understand the “this looks like a ps3/ps4 game” comments. To me this looks freakin good and I can’t wait. Nintendo has a specific art style and that’s fine. Don’t need a Zelda game in UE5.
I love seeing everyone in here complaining, it just confirms to me that this system will be easy for me to get day 1

This reminds me of the first Next-Gen games. Microsoft showing their new Halo Infinite for the next gen consoles and it looks like this. 

Running, shooting with no impact. Plain virtual, and flat graphics. 
Back again in 2025. But for $80 now.
Nintendo #droptheprices
Here’s what PS3 games looked like
#droptheprice no a los 90€ por juego
Powerful as a PS4.  PS4 price at launch adjusted for inflation $547.87.  Switch 2 price at launch $450.  Where is the problem?
"Looks like this, looks like that". Oh shut the fuck up.
I hope it's not $70-$80 like some other games which also shouldn't be
DROP THE PRICE. Or we will WII U you the fuck out of existence.

120$ for this one

This was truly a great direct (outside the price of games). However.. I am disappointed that we didn’t get an official “Star Fox” game. Possibly later within this generation? Hopefully. Outside of Starlink, I’m starting to feel like they no longer support the IP anymore.
Would be great if we could afford the fucking game
Wonder what the wear will be in the joy cons
Imagine getting cooked in a online shooter by a switch 2 player using the mouse function
These are actual shit controls bro. Just use a gamecube controller and really start playing
Fantastic as long as it still has gyro aim :)
Halo 4 looks better than this
Does it have motion controls though
Mario paint when?
At this point, why not just release it on PC? I think there is an audience and it might be arguable larger than the console gamers‘.
Fire those people, hire real gamers who don't sound like they live at Star Bucks and who can aim long enough to do a demonstration.
NaN
Impressive!!!
I think it’s a cool gimmick but doubt anyone will seriously use this other then a handful of times
Pro tip: If you want to show off mouse controls, get someone to play the game that is experienced with playing shooters on MnK
I'd need to try out the mouse mode. the way he is griping it looks uncomfortable for some reason...

It would be cooler if the right arm was attached to the gyroscope and you could move the arm out of the way, then raise it up for combat, raise left hand to scan. Etc. missed out on a good opportunity

Ever since I found out about them removing the light source of the projectiles in Metroid Prime Remastered, I can't help but be bothered by the fact that the projectiles don't cast light on the world at all.

Ever since I found out about them removing the light source of the projectiles in Metroid Prime Remastered, I can't help but be bothered by the fact that the projectiles don't cast light on the world at all.
@Ubisoft @Rainbow6Game YOU KNOW WHAT TO DO NOW!!!!! LET ME BECOME THE FIRST SIEGE CHAMPION ON NINTENDO SWITCH!
So are gyro controls completely gone? They did the work back then

like this idea but one issue is now with any online FPS you would NEED to use this and playing with the analog sticks would become a disadvantage.

if I wanted to play FPS at a desk I’ll just play PC. If I want to play Splatoon 4 lounging on the couch I guess I’ll just lose.
Wow this looks really bad actually ps3/360 level graphics
Looking at how amazing this looks, I'm already excited as to what Monolithsoft is cooking for switch 2

This is building on the foundation of Metroid Prime Remastered, but isn’t it a bit too similar to it? I hear the same music in the background like in the first one, but I guess those mouse controls will compensate for those other similarities.

Metroid hasn't evolved after so many years. They continue with the same theme of searching for energy tanks, new suits, and weapon components. The only thing they added were psychic attacks, but then it's all the same. then it doesn't make sense because on every different planet-
